author: mrmitch
title: Very useful - fun to invent with these bricks
review: We have made a car dealership showroom with these, also a mall, and a fishtank.  Work well as windows for buildings or houses. Good to have in your LEGO toolbox when creating anything. I recommend adding these to your collection if you like to build freestyle, they are affordable and can get them from time to time threw S@H.
